body.description: 100% guaranteed to clean even in hard water. Hard water expert. Removes stubborn baked-on food. Dissolves tough grease. Before. After 13 dual power pacs. Smudge shield technology. With the power of citric. Why Are We the Hard Water Experts? Well, well, well - glad we can finally meet. Here at Lemi Shine, we believe in creating the most powerful and effective formulas through rigorous lab testing to ensure we perform the best, regardless of your water hardness. Given our intense knowledge of those pesky calcium and magnesium minerals in water, our natural hero ingredient, citric acid, has your back every step of the way! That's why we are 100% guaranteed, even in hard water. Smudge Shield Technology: Fueled by a naturally-derived polymer to resist new messes. Remove 72 Hour Stuck on Food: No stains in sight here. Remove Hard Water Spots & Film: Believe us - we've got the seal to prove it. No Pre-Wash Needed: Conserve water and time. Removes Coffee, Wine & Tea Stains: Ta-ta, pesky java rings. We've got your back every step of the way. Septic System Safe: Safe to use on dishwasher-safe cookware. LemiShine.com. Take the dish detergent challenge. Facebook/LemiShine. We're here to help. LemiShine.com, 888.336.2582 M-F 9am - 5pm (CST). Dish Detergent Booster: Add to every load. In more extreme hard water conditions, add Lemi Shine's Award Winning Booster in with your dish detergent for the perfect hard water elimination duo. Shine + Dry Rinse: Refill monthly. Prevent spots in the final rinse cycle by adding Lemi Shine. Rinse to see that magical shine to impress all your guests. Dishwasher Cleaner: Use once a month. Lemi Shine dishwasher cleaner makes your machine work better, last longer, & smell like new! Biodegradable ingredients. 93% Biodegradable Ingredients: Feeling good-natured? Our plant & mineral formula sure does!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will buy again
reviews.reviewText: This is the best dishwasher detergent I’ve found so far. I’ve tried many brands and my dishes didn’t get clean. I was using power wash but now I can use the normal wash option. The pods are delicate but that makes them good as well since they completely dissolve. I took them out of the bag they came in and placed them in a container. I read others say they were broken so I handle them cautiously. I will buy again. I also added the Lemi shine booster, which didn’t help the old detergent much but works great with these pods. The old dishwashers didn’t need all this help….new ones suck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Even with hard water, this product works great, even very full loads come clean. I'm even more impressed when adding the Lemi Shine Rinse Aid which cut dry cycle down to little to nothing and dishes were dry and spotless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on Hard and Soft Water
reviews.reviewText: We have incredibly hard well water here so we had to get Culligen water softener service. We were still getting spots on everything no matter what detergent we used. We thought our dishwasher needed service but the guy was honest and said to buy the detergent, the booster and the liquid. You need all 3 but no spots at all, ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Dishwasher Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Before I discovered Lemishine, my dishes never seemed clean and almost always had a film and a salty taste- and we were THOUGHT we were using the “good stuff”. But after I discovered LemiShine Dishwasher Detergent over 10yrs ago, I REFUSE to buy anything else!! Unfortunately, it’s hard to find at my local stores so I have to order it from Amazon. Sad to see so many of the reviews give this amazing product bad reviews because of broken pods that were most likely caused by rough handling.But a suggestion for those who stated they still had dirty dishes after using Lemishine (or dishwasher detergent), clean your dishwasher filter. Yes, there’s a filter at the bottom of your dishwasher and it’s SUPER gross 🤢. Then try the Lemishine Dishwasher Cleaner. It’ll clean your dishwasher like new and I promise you’ll notice cleaner dishes thereafter! I always highly recommend Lemishine dishwasher detergent to my family and friends. I love what an amazing job it does and the safe ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Probably the most effective dishwasher pods I’ve tried, but annoyingly fragile
reviews.reviewText: In terms of how well they clean, these are probably the best dishwasher pods I’ve tried. I switched to them after the brand I’d been using for years changed their formula and started leaving residue on my dishes. After trying one other brand that didn’t help at all, I decided to give this a shot, and it made an I credible difference. The dishes come out as clean as ever, and now without any hard water or detergent residue on them, and as an added bonus, the inside of my dishwasher stays noticeably cleaner now.My one complaint, and the reason this isn’t a 5-star review, is that the pods themselves aren’t very sturdy. I haven’t had the liquid side of them pop before, but probably one in four of them was already leaking from the powder side when I got them. I’ve had multiple bags now, and this was an issue on all of them. It’s not too problematic though, you basically just have to pour some of the loose powder from the bag to supplement any time you pull out a leaky pod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for HARD WATER
reviews.reviewText: Because of the citric acid, this works fantastic for us folks with hard water in Michigan. I used to use other detergents but my dishes always came out filmy and with mineral deposits still all over the ceramic, glass, flatware, etc. I started using this and a little extra citric acid and it did the trick!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lemi-Shine dishwasher pods are great. It really cleans and leaves no water spots!
reviews.reviewText: I really like the scent of lemons. Lemi-Shine gets dishes clean and leaves no water spots. It even removes old water spots that you thought ruined all your glasses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works pretty well but I just couldn’t get past the really strong moldy smell. They also leave a small amount of residue.
